prayers.name: Immaculate Conception Prayer
prayers.text: Blessed be the pure, most Holy and Immaculate Conception of the Blessed Virgin Mary.

prayers.name: Immaculate Conception Prayer
prayers.text: Benedicta pura, sanctissima et immaculata Conceptio Beatae Mariae Virginis.

prayers.name: First Intention
prayers.text: I thank Thee, O Eternal Father, for having by Thy Almighty power preserved Mary, most holy, Thy Blessed Daughter,  rom the stain of original sin.

prayers.name: Second Intention
prayers.text: I thank Thee, O Eternal Son, for having by Thy wisdom preserved Mary, most holy, Thy Blessed Mother, from the stain of original sin.

prayers.name: Third Intention
prayers.text: I thank Thee, O Holy Spirit Eternal, for having by Thy love preserved Mary, most holy, Thy Blessed Spouse, from the stain of original sin.
